https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7E0cNopVzqCz92lCsDsr6XoNWoy.jpg In 18th century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent by the King to the Gevaudan province to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast. Brotherhood of the Wolf
